short_summary: Waste Removal and Cardboard Recycling Disposal
description: The Lethbridge Research and Development Centre requires a supplier to provide Waste Removal and Cardboard Recycling Disposal Services for the collection, removal and disposal at landfill site(s) of all waste and cardboard recycling. This shall include the supply of all containers; pick-up vehicles; and operators necessary to undertake the work at 5403 1st Ave S, Lethbridge, Alberta.

full_summary:
**Waste Removal and Cardboard Recycling Disposal Services**

**Reference Number:** cb-449-6507872
**Publication Date:** November 21, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** January 9, 2025, at 12:00 p.m. (Mountain Time)

**Description:** The Lethbridge Research and Development Centre requires a supplier to provide waste removal and cardboard recycling disposal services, including collection, removal, and disposal at landfill sites for all waste and cardboard recycling. This contract will cover the supply of containers, pick-up vehicles, and operators necessary to undertake the work at 5403 1st Ave S, Lethbridge, Alberta.

**Contract Duration:** The contract will be for one (1) calendar year, with the possibility of extending for three (3) additional one (1) year periods.

**Basis of Selection:** A bid must meet the mandatory technical requirements and be the responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price to be declared the winner.

**Requirements:**

* Responsive bid must comply with the entire requirement of the bid solicitation, including mandatory and financial evaluation criteria
* Bidders must include information on how they will meet the technical requirements of the contract
* Bidders must provide a detailed price proposal
* Bidders must provide a detailed description of their services, including the collection, removal, and disposal of waste and cardboard recycling

**Tender Submission:** Bids must be submitted electronically through the CPC Connect service provided by Canada Post Corporation. Refer to Part 2 of the bid solicitation, Bidder Instructions, for further information.

**Procurement Method:** The procurement method for this contract is competitive, open bidding.

**Solicitation Documents:** The solicitation documents, including the bid solicitation and attachments, can be downloaded from the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) website at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/solicitation-opportunities.

**Contact Information:**

* Melissa Smith, Contracting Specialist
* Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
* Western Service Centre
* 300 – 2010 12th Avenue
* Regina, SK S4P 0M3
* Telephone: (306) 515-4796
* Email: melissa.smith3@agr.gc.ca

**Essential Dates:**

* December 6, 2024: Deadline for bidders to confirm attendance for site visit
* December 10, 2024: Site visit for potential bidders
